column5: It hit like a steelhead, jumped like a steelhead, it looked like a steelhead, but as I landed, it turned out to be the smallest nookie I have ever caught,..lol,..Still a lot of fun,... very poor turnout at this trib again this year but the bite was on and the fish were aggresive today hittin red roebags like candy and crazy wild headshakin action, had some fun with a few other chrome nooks in the low to mid teens and again not another soul in site!!!     Same Fish
